title: Watch: Sister-in-law Lara Trump jokes about Barron Trump's height, 'I am 5'11'
content: "He's cool. That's the one word I would use for Barron. He's like the sleeper. He kind of stayed out of the spotlight, probably intentionally," Lara Trump said. Podcast host Patrick chimed in and added, "It's very hard (to stay out of the spotlight) to do so when you are 6'10'' by the way".
summary: "He's cool. That's the one word I would use for Barron. He's like the sleeper. He kind of stayed out of the spotlight, probably intentionally," Lara Trump said. Podcast host Patrick chimed in and added, "It's very hard (to stay out of the spotlight) to do so when you are 6'10'' by the way".

title: 'Is Kate Middleton a smoker': TV presenter Narinder Kaur apologizes for X post after massive outrage, '...because I am an Indian'
content: Following her appearance at a London Remembrance event, Kate Middleton's looks sparked controversy and revived unfounded conspiracy theories about her previous cancer diagnosis. TV personality Narinder Kaur faced severe backlash for questioning the Princess of Wales's appearance and suggesting that the princess is probably a smoker. She apologized for her comment but said she received online threats because she's a brown woman.
summary: Following her appearance at a London Remembrance event, Kate Middleton's looks sparked controversy and revived unfounded conspiracy theories about her previous cancer diagnosis. TV personality Narinder Kaur faced severe backlash for questioning the Princess of Wales's appearance and suggesting that the princess is probably a smoker. She apologized for her comment but said she received online threats because she's a brown woman.

title: Tom Homan's first statement after Trump's 'Border Czar' announcement: 'I don't care...'
content: Called the father of 'family separation', Tom Homan will be the 'Border Czar' of the Trump administration. He said he doesn't care about what people think about his strict policy on illegal immigrants. "I’ve got to go back and help because every morning… I’m pissed off with what this [Biden] administration did to the most secure border in my lifetime," Homan said.
summary: Called the father of 'family separation', Tom Homan will be the 'Border Czar' of the Trump administration. He said he doesn't care about what people think about his strict policy on illegal immigrants. "I’ve got to go back and help because every morning… I’m pissed off with what this [Biden] administration did to the most secure border in my lifetime," Homan said.

title: When Sean Diddy advised this to young children on Rosie O'Donnell show. Old video viral
content: In the 1997 episode, Rosie asked Diddy about his success. "We feel blessed, we thank God for everything. We constantly pray and know that he's responsible for everything that has been blessed and granted to us," Diddy said. "That's what we try to tell young kids, that it's important to have God in your life." The Youtube video is going viral as Diddy is accused of raping minors.
summary: In the 1997 episode, Rosie asked Diddy about his success. "We feel blessed, we thank God for everything. "That's what we try to tell young kids, that it's important to have God in your life." The Youtube video is going viral as Diddy is accused of raping minors.

title: 'Voting for John Thune is indefensible': MAGA cautious ahead of Senate leadership election
content: The Senate Majority leadership election is scheduled for Wednesday, with Republicans holding a 53-46 majority. While Trump hasn't endorsed a candidate, MAGA supporters are rallying behind Rick Scott, criticizing Thune and Cornyn for their past anti-Trump stances. Elon Musk has meanwhile endorsed Scott as the Senate leader. A list is going viral indicating Senator Ted Cruz's support for Thune.
summary: The Senate Majority leadership election is scheduled for Wednesday, with Republicans holding a 53-46 majority. While Trump hasn't endorsed a candidate, MAGA supporters are rallying behind Rick Scott, criticizing Thune and Cornyn for their past anti-Trump stances. Elon Musk has meanwhile endorsed Scott as the Senate leader. A list is going viral indicating Senator Ted Cruz's support for Thune.

title: Ivory coast road accident: Deadly collision claims 21 lives, injures 11
Tom Homan's old spat video with AOC viral after Trump picks him as Border Czar
content: ​Called the father of family separation in immigration policies, Tom Homan was reportedly a contributor to Project 2025 from which Donald Trump distanced himself and said he did not know who were the people behind Project 2025. Once Tom Homan told Pramila Jayapal, "You work for me. I am a taxpayer."

title: When Usha Vance's grandfather's Telugu accent made IIT students fall in love with him
content: IIT alumni worldwide are celebrating Usha Chilukuri, granddaughter of esteemed IIT professor Rama Sastri, as she becomes the first Indian American Second Lady of the US. Known for his Telugu-accented English and dedicated teaching, Rama Sastri left a legacy in IIT lore, from humorous mess fee debates to a transformative MIT stint. Usha, Yale and Cambridge-educated, embodies this legacy, marrying JD Vance, Trump’s running mate. This milestone connects IIT’s academic heritage with the pinnacle of American politics.
summary: IIT alumni worldwide are celebrating Usha Chilukuri, granddaughter of esteemed IIT professor Rama Sastri, as she becomes the first Indian American Second Lady of the US. Known for his Telugu-accented English and dedicated teaching, Rama Sastri left a legacy in IIT lore, from humorous mess fee debates to a transformative MIT stint. Usha, Yale and Cambridge-educated, embodies this legacy, marrying JD Vance, Trump’s running mate. This milestone connects IIT’s academic heritage with the pinnacle of American politics.

title: 'What the hell is wrong with Michael Strahan': Backlash for hand gesture on Veterans Day
content: Michael Strahan is facing criticism for not placing his hand over his heart during the national anthem at a Veterans Day tribute event. The Fox Sports analyst, whose father served in the Army, stood with his hands clasped in front of him. "@michaelstrahan you should be absolutely ASHAMED of yourself disrespecting these men and women! You owe everyone an apology..." one user wrote.
summary: Michael Strahan is facing criticism for not placing his hand over his heart during the national anthem at a Veterans Day tribute event.  The Fox Sports analyst, whose father served in the Army, stood with his hands clasped in front of him. "@michaelstrahan you should be absolutely ASHAMED of yourself disrespecting these men and women! You owe everyone an apology..." one user wrote.

title: Kamala Harris' former staff has this WILD idea to make her first female president: 'Biden must...'
content: The former Kamala Harris staff thinks Democrats should do something crazy before January 6. ​"Dems have better policies but we must realize the old rules no longer apply. We are not playing table tennis. We are in a mixed martial arts fight and Americans respond to drama and excitement. We should use that to make our arguments for a better path forward," Jamal Simmons added.
summary: The former Kamala Harris staff thinks Democrats should do something crazy before January 6. ​"Dems have better policies but we must realize the old rules no longer apply. We are not playing table tennis. We are in a mixed martial arts fight and Americans respond to drama and excitement. We should use that to make our arguments for a better path forward," Jamal Simmons added.

title: 'Not my job to...' : Meghan Markle's seven-word response when confronted over bullying
content: Meghan Markle, the Duchess of Sussex, allegedly faced accusations of harsh treatment towards palace staff, as claimed by royal biographer Robert Lacey. Lacey's book reveals allegations of Meghan's demanding behavior and a tense work environment. Meghan refuted these claims, suggesting they were part of a smear campaign, while her friends defended her character.

Lacey's book reveals allegations of Meghan's demanding behavior and a tense work environment.  Meghan refuted these claims, suggesting they were part of a smear campaign, while her friends defended her character.

title: How Barron Trump played key role in his father's victory
content: Donald Trump's son, Barron Trump, played a significant role in his father's recent election victory. Lara Trump revealed Barron's behind-the-scenes contributions, highlighting his strategic suggestions for securing votes. Notably, Barron advised his father to engage with young audiences through podcasts, leading to successful interviews with internet personalities like Adin Ross.
summary: Donald Trump's son, Barron Trump, played a significant role in his father's recent election victory. Lara Trump revealed Barron's behind-the-scenes contributions, highlighting his strategic suggestions for securing votes. Notably, Barron advised his father to engage with young audiences through podcasts, leading to successful interviews with internet personalities like Adin Ross.

title: MATGA: Meet the women who want to make poisoning men great again after Trump victory
When NYU friends asked Barron Trump who he voted for he says he doesn't ...
content: Barron Trump, son of former President Donald Trump, has reportedly surprised his NYU peers by declining to reveal his political stance, stating he "doesn't support any party." Despite this, sources close to the family suggest Barron played a key role in his father's 2024 campaign, particularly in connecting him with influential podcasters to reach a younger demographic.
summary: Barron Trump, son of former President Donald Trump, has reportedly surprised his NYU peers by declining to reveal his political stance, stating he "doesn't support any party." Despite this, sources close to the family suggest Barron played a key role in his father's 2024 campaign, particularly in connecting him with influential podcasters to reach a younger demographic.

title: Who is Rick Scott, GOP Senator endorsed by Elon Musk for Senate majority leader
content: Elon Musk has endorsed Republican Senator Rick Scott for Senate majority leader. Scott is vying for the position against Senators John Thune and John Cornyn. Trump stated that any Republican Senator seeking the leadership position must agree to recess appointments. Scott agreed and pledged to get Trump's nominations through quickly.
summary: Elon Musk has endorsed Republican Senator Rick Scott for Senate majority leader. Scott is vying for the position against Senators John Thune and John Cornyn. Trump stated that any Republican Senator seeking the leadership position must agree to recess appointments. Scott agreed and pledged to get Trump's nominations through quickly.

title: Indian American Democratic fundraiser receives racist messages
content: Ajay Jain Bhutoria, an Indian American and Democratic Party fundraiser, has been targeted with racist and threatening messages urging him to return to India. The messages, sent from an unknown number, accused Bhutoria of prioritizing Indian interests over American ones.
summary: Ajay Jain Bhutoria, an Indian American and Democratic Party fundraiser, has been targeted with racist and threatening messages urging him to return to India. The messages, sent from an unknown number, accused Bhutoria of prioritizing Indian interests over American ones.

title: Trump slams Democrats for involving Liz Cheney in 2024 election campaign
content: Former President Donald Trump criticised the Democratic Party for involving former Republican Representative Liz Cheney and her father, Dick Cheney, in their 2024 campaign. Trump believes their involvement will negatively impact the Democrats and that bringing "losers" into a campaign is unwise. He also referred to Liz Cheney as a "war hawk" for her past support of military intervention.
summary: Former President Donald Trump criticised the Democratic Party for involving former Republican Representative Liz Cheney and her father, Dick Cheney, in their 2024 campaign. Trump believes their involvement will negatively impact the Democrats and that bringing "losers" into a campaign is unwise. He also referred to Liz Cheney as a "war hawk" for her past support of military intervention.

title: Twin earthquakes shake Cuba in wake of recent hurricanes, blackouts
content: Two strong earthquakes, registering magnitudes of 5.9 and 6.8, struck off the coast of southern Cuba, causing panic and damage to buildings and infrastructure. The quakes occurred just days after Hurricanes Rafael and Oscar impacted the island, compounding the difficulties faced by residents already grappling with power outages and an economic crisis.
summary: Two strong earthquakes, registering magnitudes of 5.9 and 6.8, struck off the coast of southern Cuba, causing panic and damage to buildings and infrastructure. The quakes occurred just days after Hurricanes Rafael and Oscar impacted the island, compounding the difficulties faced by residents already grappling with power outages and an economic crisis.

title: Trump pressures candidates for Senate GOP leader to allow ‘recess appointments’
content: President-elect Donald Trump urged the next Senate Republican leader to back the use of "recess appointments" to expedite Cabinet confirmations. Trump emphasized the need to fill positions swiftly and prevent delays similar to his first term. The three candidates vying for the leadership position expressed openness to Trump's suggestion, highlighting the significance of his endorsement.
summary: President-elect Donald Trump urged the next Senate Republican leader to back the use of "recess appointments" to expedite Cabinet confirmations. Trump emphasized the need to fill positions swiftly and prevent delays similar to his first term.  The three candidates vying for the leadership position expressed openness to Trump's suggestion, highlighting the significance of his endorsement.

title: Pakistan Railways suspends train services to and from Quetta station after explosion
content: Following a deadly explosion at Quetta railway station that claimed 26 lives and injured 62, Pakistan Railways has suspended train services to and from the station until November 14th. The blast occurred during the departure of the Jaffar Express, with numerous passengers present.
summary: Following a deadly explosion at Quetta railway station that claimed 26 lives and injured 62, Pakistan Railways has suspended train services to and from the station until November 14th. The blast occurred during the departure of the Jaffar Express, with numerous passengers present.
